mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (uid, nickname, object_id, bio, last_seen_at, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{uid}, #{nickname}, #{objectId}, #{bio}, #{lastSeenAt}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
INSERT INTO formal_users (user_id, username, password_hash, create_time, update_time, last_login_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{username}, #{passwordHash}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{lastLoginTime})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, username, password_hash as passwordHash, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, last_login_time as lastLoginTime FROM formal_users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT u.id, u.uid, u.nickname, u.object_id, u.bio, u.last_seen_at, u.create_time, u.update_time, f.username FROM formal_users f JOIN users u ON f.user_id = u.id WHERE f.username = #{username}
SELECT u.id, u.uid, u.nickname, u.object_id, u.bio, u.last_seen_at, u.create_time, u.update_time, f.username FROM users u LEFT JOIN formal_users f ON u.id = f.user_id WHERE uid = #{userUid}
SELECT id FROM users WHERE uid = #{uid}
SELECT u.id, u.uid, u.nickname, u.object_id, u.bio, u.last_seen_at, u.create_time, u.update_time, f.username FROM users u LEFT JOIN formal_users f ON u.id = f.user_id WHERE u.id = #{id}
SELECT u.id, u.uid, u.nickname, u.object_id, u.bio, u.last_seen_at, u.create_time, u.update_time, f.username FROM users u LEFT JOIN formal_users f ON u.id = f.user_id WHERE u.uid = #{uid}

SELECT u.id, u.uid, u.nickname, u.object_id, u.bio, u.last_seen_at, u.create_time, u.update_time, o.object_name as avatarObjectName FROM users u LEFT JOIN objects o ON u.object_id = o.id WHERE u.uid = #{uid} LIMIT 1
